sentence.Network_en: He was able to shoot down a flying bird with the bow and arrow.
sentence.Network_cn: 他张弓搭箭能射落空中的飞鸟.

sentence.Network_en: At the meeting Smith made some objection to my plan which I was able to shoot down in flames with no trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那次会议上,史密斯对我的计划颇有微词,对此我毫不费事地进行了严厉谴责.

sentence.Network_en: Faber found his boastfulness irritating. " How many enemy aircraft did you shoot down? "
sentence.Network_cn: 费伯被他的吹嘘激怒了. “ 你打下几架敌机 呢 ? ”

list.abs: shoot - 维基词典，自由的多语言词典 ... shoot away 不停地发射子弹、射完 shoot down 击落（飞机等）； shoot forth 射出、伸出、 …
求180个英语短语_百度知道 ... settle down 定居 shoot down 击落,击毙,驳倒 shoot up 迅速上升;猛增.

means.word_mean: 1. murder by shooting someone down in cold blood
